name: COBIT
description: Control Objectives for Information and Related Technologies

domains.name: EDM - Enterprise Governance of IT
domains.description: Ensure the enterprise's IT is directed and managed to achieve business objectives.

controls.name: Ensure Governance Framework Setting and Maintenance
controls.description: Establish and maintain the governance framework and the supporting processes to achieve the enterprise objectives.

controls.name: Ensure Benefits Delivery
controls.description: Ensure that IT-enabled investments are managed to deliver optimized business benefits.

domains.name: APO - Align, Plan, and Organize
domains.description: Define a strategic IT plan that aligns with the enterprise's strategic objectives.

controls.name: Manage the IT Management Framework
controls.description: Define and maintain the IT management framework to execute the IT strategy.

controls.name: Define the Information Architecture
controls.description: Define and maintain a formal framework for IT architecture to direct the design, development, and use of information in an enterprise.

domains.name: Security Controls
domains.description: Establish a foundational set of organizational-level information security controls to help organizations assess and improve their cybersecurity posture.

controls.name: Access Control
controls.description: Ensure that access to systems and networks is limited to authorized individuals and devices.

controls.name: Data Protection
controls.description: Ensure that sensitive data is protected through secure storage and transmission.

domains.name: Security Operations
domains.description: Focus on the detection and response to cybersecurity threats.

controls.name: Incident Response and Management
controls.description: Develop and implement an incident response capability to quickly detect, respond to, and recover from cybersecurity incidents.

controls.name: Continuous Monitoring
controls.description: Implement continuous monitoring processes to detect and respond to security events in real time.

name: SCAIO
description: Security Compliance and Auditing for Infrastructure and Operations

domains.name: Infrastructure Security
domains.description: Implement security measures to protect the organization's infrastructure.

controls.name: Network Security
controls.description: Implement measures to secure the organization's network infrastructure.

controls.name: Endpoint Protection
controls.description: Implement measures to secure endpoints, including servers, workstations, and mobile devices.

domains.name: Operational Compliance
domains.description: Ensure compliance with security policies and standards in daily operations.

controls.name: Policy Enforcement
controls.description: Enforce security policies and standards to ensure consistent compliance across the organization.

controls.name: Audit and Accountability
controls.description: Implement auditing and accountability measures to track and monitor security-related activities.

domains.name: IEC 62443 - Industrial Network and System Security
domains.description: Standards for industrial automation and control systems security.

controls.name: Security Development Lifecycle
controls.description: Implement a security development lifecycle for industrial automation and control systems.

controls.name: Access Control and Policy Enforcement
controls.description: Implement access controls and policy enforcement mechanisms for industrial networks.

domains.name: IEC 27001 - Information Security Management
domains.description: Standards for information security management systems.

controls.name: Risk Assessment and Treatment
controls.description: Conduct risk assessments and apply treatment measures to manage information security risks.

controls.name: Security Awareness and Training
controls.description: Provide security awareness and training programs for personnel to enhance information security.

domains.name: ISO 27002 - Information Security Controls
domains.description: Code of practice for information security controls.

controls.name: Information Classification and Handling
controls.description: Classify information assets and define controls for their handling.

controls.name: Cryptographic Controls
controls.description: Implement cryptographic controls to protect sensitive information.

domains.name: ISO 31000 - Risk Management
domains.description: Principles and guidelines for risk management.

controls.name: Risk Identification and Assessment
controls.description: Identify and assess risks to the organization's information assets and operations.

controls.name: Risk Treatment and Mitigation
controls.description: Develop and implement risk treatment plans to mitigate identified risks.
